text: The Resident is an American medical drama television series released on Fox from January 21, 2018, to January 17, 2023. The series premiered on Fox as a mid-season replacement during the 2017â€“18 television season. The focus point of the series is on the lives and duties of staff members at the fictional Chastain Park Memorial Hospital in Atlanta, Georgia. Amy Holden Jones, Hayley Schore, and Roshan Sethi created the series. The series was purchased by Fox from Showtime in 2017. In May 2017, Fox ordered the project to series, with a 14-episode season order. The series premiere was a lead-out to the Vikings- Eagles NFC Championship Game. The series was renewed for a fifth season in May 2021, which premiered on September 21, 2021. In May 2022, the series was renewed for a sixth season, which premiered on September 20, 2022. In April 2023, the series was cancelled after six seasons. == References ==
title: The Resident (TV series)
